review: So far no satisfaction with the Firestick. First one worked upon initial set up but as soon as we turned off the tv it quit working. Spoke with someone at Amazon and they sent us another one. Exact same thing happened. Spoke with someone at Amazon again who had me try several things (most of which I had already tried based on troubleshooting videos/helps.) Still nothing. Was asked for make and model number of our TV and told that the info was being sent to another group/division, something like that. Last call I received was four nights ago saying whoever has our info still has it and someone will get back to us. Seemed line it would be a great thing to have but so far not the case. I will say our TV is 9 years old but it is an HDTV and it has HDMI ports.
